panels.description:
CurrEstab - The TCP connection volume which status is ESTABLISHED or CLOSE-WAIT 

ActiveOpens - The average(1 min) TCP connection volume changed status from CLOSED to SYN_SENT

PassiveOpens - The average(1 min) TCP connection volume changed status from LISTEN to SYN_RCVD

TCP_alloc - The TCP connection volume allocated (Established & applied for sk_buff)

TCP_inuse - The TCP connection volume which is in-used

TCP_tw - The TCP connection volume which wait to be closed
panels.title: TCP connection status
